languages.text: "Висирь учил, что культистами смерти зовут нам подобных — священных убийц, проливающих кровь во имя Его по всему Империуму. Также учил он, что не бывает двух одинаковых культов смерти, как не бывает двух идентичных звезд. Я поведаю тебе о Кровавой паутине, но за все культы смерти говорить не смогу".

"The Vizsier taught us that there are many like us throughout the Imperium who spill blood in His name — 'death cultists,' as they call us. He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."
languages.original_text: "Висирь учил, что культистами смерти зовут нам подобных — священных убийц, проливающих кровь во имя Его по всему Империуму. Также учил он, что не бывает двух одинаковых культов смерти, как не бывает двух идентичных звезд. Я поведаю тебе о Кровавой паутине, но за все культы смерти говорить не смогу".

traits.locale_text: "The Vizsier taught us that death cultists is what they call others like us — sacred killers who spill blood in His name across all of the Imperium. He explained as well that no two death cults are the same, as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak for all death cults."

He explained as well that no two death cults are the same, as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak for all death cults."

He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

languages.text: «El Visir nos enseñó que en el Imperium hay muchos como nosotros, dispuestos a derramar sangre en Su nombre; "cultos de la muerte", nos llaman. Decía que no había dos cultos iguales, como tampoco hay dos estrellas iguales en todo el vacío. Yo puedo hablarle sobre la Red Sanguinolenta, pero no sé nada de los otros cultos de la muerte».
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier taught us that there are many like us throughout the Imperium who spill blood in His name — 'death cultists,' as they call us. He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

traits.locale_text: «El Visir nos enseñó que en el Imperium hay muchos como nosotros, dispuestos a derramar sangre en Su nombre; "cultos de la muerte", nos llaman. Decía que no había dos cultos iguales, como tampoco hay dos estrellas iguales en todo el vacío. Yo puedo hablarle sobre la Red Sanguinolenta, pero no sé nada de los otros cultos de la muerte».

languages.text: 「ヴィジールは、帝国のいたるところに私たちのように主の名のもとに血を流す…死のカルトと呼ばれている者たちが大勢いることを教えてくれたわ。彼は、虚空に同じ星が二つとないように、同じ死のカルトは二つとないと言っていた。ブラッドスパン・ウェブについては話すけれど、すべての死のカルトを代弁することはできないわ」
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier taught us that there are many like us throughout the Imperium who spill blood in His name — 'death cultists,' as they call us. He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィジールは、帝国のいたるところに私たちのように主の名のもとに血を流す…死のカルトと呼ばれている者たちが大勢いることを教えてくれたわ。彼は、虚空に同じ星が二つとないように、同じ死のカルトは二つとないと言っていた。ブラッドスパン・ウェブについては話すけれど、すべての死のカルトを代弁することはできないわ」

languages.text: “宿老告诉我们，说整个帝国有许多像我们这样的人，以祂的名义播撒鲜血。人们称呼我们为‘拜死教教徒’。他说，每支拜死教派都是独一无二的，正如虚空之中没有哪两颗星星是相同的。我可以告诉你织血罗网的一切，但我的答案无法代表所有拜死教派。”
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier taught us that there are many like us throughout the Imperium who spill blood in His name — 'death cultists,' as they call us. He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

traits.locale_text: “宿老告诉我们，说整个帝国有许多像我们这样的人，以祂的名义播撒鲜血。人们称呼我们为‘拜死教教徒’。他说，每支拜死教派都是独一无二的，正如虚空之中没有哪两颗星星是相同的。我可以告诉你织血罗网的一切，但我的答案无法代表所有拜死教派。”

languages.text: "Der Wesir hat uns gelehrt, dass es im Imperium viele wie uns gibt, die in Seinem Namen Blut vergießen – 'Todeskultisten', wie sie uns nennen. Er hat gesagt, dass keine zwei Todeskulte sich gleichen, genau wie es in der Leere keine zwei identischen Sterne gibt. Ich werde Euch vom Blutgesponnenen Netz berichten, aber ich kann nicht im Namen aller Todeskulte sprechen."
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier taught us that there are many like us throughout the Imperium who spill blood in His name — 'death cultists,' as they call us. He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

traits.locale_text: "Der Wesir hat uns gelehrt, dass es im Imperium viele wie uns gibt, die in Seinem Namen Blut vergießen – 'Todeskultisten', wie sie uns nennen. Er hat gesagt, dass keine zwei Todeskulte sich gleichen, genau wie es in der Leere keine zwei identischen Sterne gibt. Ich werde Euch vom Blutgesponnenen Netz berichten, aber ich kann nicht im Namen aller Todeskulte sprechen."

languages.text: « Selon le vizir, nous sommes nombreux à travers l'Imperium à verser le sang en Son nom, nous les "cultistes de la mort", comme on nous appelle. D'après lui, chaque culte de la mort est différent, tout comme il n'existe pas deux étoiles identiques dans le néant. Je veux bien vous parler de la Toile de Sang, mais je ne peux pas m'exprimer au nom des autres congrégations. »
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier taught us that there are many like us throughout the Imperium who spill blood in His name — 'death cultists,' as they call us. He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

languages.original_text: "The Vizsier taught us that there are many like us throughout the Imperium who spill blood in His name — 'death cultists,' as they call us. He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."

languages.text: "Vezir bize, İmparatorluk'ta bizim gibi O'nun adına kan döken nicesi olduğunu öğretmişti... Bize 'ölüm tarikatçıları' derler. Hiçbir ölüm tarikatının birbirinin aynısı olmadığını söylerdi. Uçsuzdaki yıldızların da bambaşka olması gibi. Sana Kanipi Ağı'nı anlatacağım ama diğer ölüm tarikatları adına konuşamam."
languages.original_text: "The Vizsier taught us that there are many like us throughout the Imperium who spill blood in His name — 'death cultists,' as they call us. He said that no two death cults are the same, just as there are no two identical stars in the void. I will tell you about the Bloodspun Web, but I cannot speak on behalf of all death cults."
